alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 13 at 8:00AM CST until December 13 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN GRAYSON COUNTY... At 759 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Willis, or 11 miles north of Whitesboro, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Pottsboro around 815 AM CST. Lake Texoma around 820 AM CST. Southwestern Lake Texoma around 845 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Dixie, Sandusky, Preston, Gordonville, Locust and Sherwood Shores. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
